title: Dollar Slumps Ahead of Fed as Stocks, Gold Rally: Markets Wrap
description: The dollar sank to the lowest level in almost four years, reflecting investor caution toward the world’s reserve currency amid unpredictable policymaking from Washington. The weakness spurred a rally in the yen, gold and US stocks.
content: The dollar sank to the lowest level in almost four years, reflecting investor caution toward the world’s reserve currency amid unpredictable policymaking from Washington. The weakness spurred a rally in the yen, gold and US stocks.
